lim@d<MER>w* heyTe<TEB>b d*ir@S<MER>w* miS@p*A<TIP>T 'aW/*.@r<MUN>w* xAm<ATN>w^oY Sip@T<MUN>w* yAt<ZQP>w^om ri<TIP>ybw* 'al@mAnA<SIL>h:

l@kw*=nA<TEB>' w@niw*A<SIL>k@xA<TIP>h yo'ma<MUN>r y@hwA<ATN>h 'im=yi<SIL>h@y<AZL>w* x<HPA>TA'eykE<MEH>m k*aW/*.Aniym<PAS> k*aW/*.E<MUN>lEg yal@b*i<ZQP>ynw* 'im=ya'@d*i<MER>ymw* kat*w^olA<TIP>` k*aY*E<MER>mEr yi<SIL>h@y<SIL>w*:
'im=t*o'b<TIP>w* w*S@ma`@t*E<ATN>m T<MER>w*b hA'A<TIP>rEY t*o'ke<SIL>lw*:
w@'im=t*@mA<SIL>'<HPA>n<TIP>w* w*m@riytE<ATN>m xE<MUN>rEb t*@'uk*@l<ZQP>w* k*i<TEB>y p*i<MER>y y@hwA<TIP>h d*ib*e<SIL>r:
'eykAh<PAS> hA<SIL>y@tA<MUN>h l@zw^onA<ZQP>h qir@yA<TIP>h nE<SIL>'<HSE>mAnA<ATN>h m@le<SIL>'<HPA>ti<MUN>y miS@p*A<RBM>T YE<TEB>dEq yAli<MER>yn b*A<TIP>h* w@`at*A<MER>h m@raY*@xi<SIL>ym:

WAra<MUN>yik@ s<SIL>w^or@ri<RBM>ym w@xab@rey<PAS> g*an*Abi<ZQP>ym k*ul*w^o<PAS> 'ohe<MUN>b So<ZQP>xad w@rode<TIP>p Sal@moni<ATN>ym yAtw^om<PAS> lo<MUN>' yiS@p*o<ZQP>Tw* w@ri<MER>yb 'al@mAnA<TIP>h lo<SIL>'=yAb<MER>w^o' '<HPA>leyhE<SIL>m:
lAke<RBM>n n@'u<MEH>m hA<SIL>'Adw^on<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>w^ot '<HPA>bi<TIP>yr yiW@rA'e<ATN>l h<YET>w^oy 'En*Axe<MUN>m miY*Ara<ZQP>y w@'in*A<SIL>q@mA<TIP>h me'<SIL>w^oy@bA<SIL>y:
w@'ASi<MEH>ybAh yAdiy<PAS> `Ala<ZQP>yik@ w@'EY@ro<MER>p k*ab*o<TIP>r siygA<ATN>yik@ w@'Asi<TIP>yrAh k*Al=b*@diylA<SIL>yik@:

w@'ASi<MEH>ybAh So<SIL>p@Ta<AZL>yik@<PAS> k*@bAri<MUN>'SonA<ZQP>h w@yo<SIL>`<HPA>Ya<TIP>yik@ k*@bat*@xil*A<ATN>h 'a<SIL>x<HPA>rey=ke<RBM>n yiq*A<MEH>re' lAk@<PAS> `i<MUN>yr haY*E<ZQP>dEq qir@yA<TIP>h nE<SIL>'<HSE>mAnA<SIL>h:

w@SE<DAR>bEr p*o<SIL>S@`i<TEB>ym w@xaT*A'i<TIP>ym yax@d*A<ATN>w w@`o<SIL>z@be<MER>y y@hwA<TIP>h yik@l<SIL>w*:

w@hAyA<MEH>h hE<SIL>xAson<PAS> lin@`o<ZQP>rEt w*po<SIL>`<HPA>l<TIP>w^o l@niyY<ATN>w^oY w*bA<SIL>`<HPA>r<DAR>w* S@neyhE<TEB>m yax@d*A<TIP>w w@'e<MER>yn m@kab*E<SIL>h:

w@SApaT<PAS> b*e<MUN>yn hag*w^oyi<ZQP>m w@hw^oki<TIP>yxa l@`am*i<MUN>ym rab*i<ATN>ym w@kit*@t<AZL>w* xar@bw^otA<GER>m l@'it*i<RBM>ym wax<HPA>niyt<SIL>w^oteyhEm<PAS> l@maz@mer<ZQP>w^ot lo<SIL>'=yiW/*ׂA<AZL>' g<MEH>w^oy 'El=g*w^oy<PAS> xE<ZQP>rEb w@lo<SIL>'=yil@m@d<MER>w* `<TIP>w^od mil@xAmA<SIL>h:
b*e<TIP>yt ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<ATN>b l@k<MER>w* w@ne<SIL>l@kA<TIP>h b*@'<MER>w^or y@hwA<SIL>h:

`eyne<GAR>y g*ab@h<MEH>w*t 'AdAm<PAS> SApe<ZQP>l w@Sa<TIP>x r<MUN>w*m '<HPA>nASi<ATN>ym w@niW@g*a<DAR>b y@hwA<TEB>h l@bad*<TIP>w^o b*ay*<MER>w^om hah<SIL>w*':
k*i<MUN>y y<GAR>w^om la<SIL>yhwA<DAR>h Y@bA'<TEB>w^ot `a<MER>l k*Al=g*e'E<TIP>h wArA<ATN>m w@`a<TIP>l k*Al=niW/*ׂA<MER>' w@SApe<SIL>l:

k*iy<TLP> hin*e<AZL>h hA<SIL>'Ad<GER>w^on y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<RBM>w^ot mesi<MEH>yr miyr<SIL>w*SAla<AZL>im<PAS> w*mi<MUN>yhw*dA<ZQP>h maS@`e<TIP>n w*maS@`enA<ATN>h k*o<YET>l miS@`an=lE<ZQP>xEm w@ko<TIP>l miS@`an=mA<SIL>yim:
g*ib*<TIP>w^or w@'i<MUN>yS mil@xAmA<ATN>h Sw^ope<MER>T w@nAbi<TIP>y' w@qose<MER>m w@zAqe<SIL>n:
War=x<HPA>miW/*.i<TIP>ym w*n@W<MUN>w*' pAni<ATN>ym w@yw^o`e<TEB>Y wa<SIL>x<HPA>ka<MER>m x<HPA>rASi<TIP>ym w*n@b<MER>w^on lA<SIL>xaS:
w@nA<SIL>tat*i<MER>y n@`Ari<TIP>ym WA<SIL>reyhE<ATN>m w@ta<SIL>`<HPA>lw*li<TIP>ym yim@S@lw*=bA<SIL>m:
w@nig*a<MUN>W hA`A<ZQP>m 'i<MER>yS b*@'i<TIP>yS w@'i<MUN>yS b*@re`e<ATN>hw* yir@h<HPA>b<RBM>w* han*a<AZL>`ar<PAS> b*az*Aqe<ZQP>n w@han*iq@lE<TIP>h b*an*ik@b*A<SIL>d:
k*i<SIL>y=yit@p*o<AZL>W 'i<MEH>yS b*@'Axiyw<PAS> b*e<MUN>yt 'Abi<ZQP>yw Wim@lA<MUN>h l@kA<ZQP>h qAYi<TIP>yn t*i<SIL>h@yEh=l*A<ATN>nw* w@ham*ak@SelA<MER>h haz*o<TIP>'t t*a<MER>xat yAdE<SIL>kA:
yiW/*ׂA'<TLP> bay*<AZL>w^om hah<MEH>w*' | le'mor<PAS> lo<SIL>'='Eh@yE<MUN>h xobe<ZQP>S w*b@beyti<ZQM>y 'e<MER>yn lE<TIP>xEm w@'e<MUN>yn Wim@lA<ATN>h lo<MER>' t@Wiymu<TIP>niy q@Yi<MER>yn `A<SIL>m:
k*i<MEH>y kA<SIL>S@lAh<PAS> y@r<MUN>w*SAla<ZQP>im wi<SIL>yhw*dA<TIP>h nApA<ATN>l k*i<SIL>y=l@Sw^onA<MEH>m w*ma<SIL>`al@leyhEm<PAS> 'El=y@hwA<ZQP>h lam@r<TIP>w^ot `ene<MER>y k@bw^od<SIL>w^o:
hak*Ara<MEH>t p*@neyhEm<PAS> `A<MUN>n@tAh b*A<ZQP>m w@xaT*A'tA<TEB>m k*is@do<MER>m hig*i<TIP>ydw* lo<MUN>' kixe<ATN>dw* '<MUN>w^oy l@nap@SA<ZQP>m k*i<SIL>y=gAm@l<MER>w* lAhE<TIP>m rA`A<SIL>h:

`am*iy<PAS> no<SIL>g@WA<MUN>yw m@`w^ole<ZQP>l w@nASi<TIP>ym mA<MUN>S@lw* b<ATN>w^o `am*iy<PAS> m@'aW/*.@rE<MUN>ykA mat@`i<ZQP>ym w@dE<MER>rEk@ 'o<SIL>r@xotE<TIP>ykA b*il*e<SIL>`w*:
niY*A<MER>b lAri<TIP>yb y@hwA<ATN>h w@`ome<TIP>d lAdi<MER>yn `am*i<SIL>ym:
